commit message: Removed simple-xml, now using Serializable in Exam
Added ECTS, SWS and try count to Exam

Implemented StudiportalData

StudiportalData can now parse the entire HTML table
Created a key for last studiportal data
Now displaying all Exams in fragment's list
Added enums to Exam to easily determit the state
Fixed a error which caused only the shorthand of the state to be shown
Addded menu item to open studiportal online
Displaying full state name in notification
Fixed a error causing resignated exams to be shown as an
Displaying full notes instead of shorthands
Fixed a problem causing the progressdialog showing up to late
Optimized the id generation to prevent multiple exams to have the same id
Added search menu item in MainActivity
Added gap between icon and text
Removing saved data when logging out
Added exception_general and added information to exception_wrong_user_password_long
Displaying a error message in progress dialog
Added a title to error dialogs
Removed polling options less than one hour
Automatically set the polling time to one hour if it is less
Force the ViewPagerAdapter to refresh when new infos are available
Empty query causes now a empty result
Added a checkbox to show the entered password
